name: Untitled Card Game (UCG)
description:
Untitled Card Game

Untitled Card Game (UCG) is a card game where you don't know any of the enemy's stats at the beginning of the fight, and you have to reveal those stats throughout the battle

Rules

There are three moves you can choose from :- Observe, Attack, Parry 

Observe is a passive move which leaves you vulnerable to the enemy's attack, but also allows you to reveal their stats and also increase your own

Attack is an offensive move which can deal damage to the enemy, but only if they are not parrying

Parry is a defensive move which counters enemy's attack

Attack and Parry have cooldowns while Observe can be used without cooldowns

Your enemy can also use these moves and counter your moves! You have to try and predict your enemy and outsmart them in order to win, good luck!

Note: UCG is a prototype made within a short time, so you may encounter bugs or issues. I would really appreciate your feedback on the game, so please comment if you have any bugs to report or ideas to suggest!
